title: Comdecevis Men's Casual Cargo Pants Workout Joggers Stretch Sweatpants Hiking Drawstring Tactical Pants with Multi Pockets
description: Lightweight Material: These cargo pants for men are made from a lightweight utility polyester fabric that is durable while remaining breathable and comfortable.

Practical Design: Men's hiking pants have 4 large pockets and a drawstring waistband design, which is more comfortable and convenient to wear.Reinforced treatment at the pocket, keep your phone, keys or wallet from falling out when jogging or running.

Drawstring and Straight Leg Design: The mens sweatpants have a straight leg design and a drawstring waistband design, suitable as cargo pants for men, joggers for men, sweatpants for mens, men's hiking pants, relaxed fit sweatpants.

Multiple Occasions: These men's work pants can be easily matched with various outfits and suitable for various occasions. Whether you're hiking, gym, yoga, exercise, running, bodybuilding, weightlifting, basketball, working, outdoors, training, track and field.
Men's Fashion Gift: Men's cargo pants are a great men's fashion item, also great as a gift for your husband, father, kids or friends, it's a perfect men's gift.
